aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

s3vectors:vectorbuckettag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the vector bucket

s3vectors:kmskeyarn.description: Filters access by the AWS KMS key ARN for the key used to encrypt a vector bucket

s3vectors:ssetype.description: Filters access by server-side encryption type
